Mom sure knows how to stink it up, I guess that's where I get it from."

You enter the living room to see Jessica sitting on the couch, emitting small giggles and looking at you amused. The game on the TV was paused. Josh stands in the middle of the living room slightly bent over, his jeans pulled down just below his ass to expose his boxers. His back is turned towards you and he is looking at you over his shoulder.

"Come here and kneel down, quick!!" Josh says urgently.

This was the last straw. At this point, you have accepted that you are your little brother's bitch and there's nothing you can do about it. Lewis keeps his hand steady on the back of your head, although in this moment you both know that he doesn't need to and even if he moved his hand, you would keep your face there. He has won your submission entirely and he knows it.

You submissively sniff up his fart. It's absolutely rancid, as expected. Apparently, Jessica could tell from the look on your face because she started to laugh so hard that tears started rolling down her cheek. Lewis, clearly pleased that you have accepted your place, smiles.

He releases his hand from the back of your head, and you slowly let yourself fall to the ground, defeated. You watch, sideways from the ground, as Lewis pulls his pants back up and walks over towards Jessica on the couch. He sits down next to her.

"That's all I wanted. Now you can go finish making food."

You nod, get up, and walk towards the kitchen.

11112212121112121.content:
You return to the kitchen and begin preparing food. It takes you about 30 minutes or so, but you decided on grilled cheese and french fries, which was easy enough, considering all you had to do was throw the fries in the oven.

You become worried in your head over what just happened - did you just willingly sniff Lewis's fart in front of the only girl who had shown you affection in months? The embarrassment and humiliation of the whole situation - the fact that you were on your knees, your face in his ass, while he stood above you (literally and figuratively) and farted directly into your nose in front of her - must have sapped every and any glimmer of self-respect and free will that you had left. You belong to him now - better to accept it and try to please him than to resist anymore be punished. Your brother owns you, and you both know it.

"No," you think to yourself. "You are an individual with self-respect and free will, and this will all be over eventually when mom and dad get home."

Lewis and Jessica must have smelled the food, because they come into the room just as you finish up setting the table.

"Hey stinky," your brother greets you. Jessica giggles at this a little. "Food looks good."

You nod and pull Jessica's chair out for her. You gesture for her to sit.

"C'mon bro, I thought you were a gentleman!" Lewis says. "You're gonna make her sit on that uncomfortable cushion? Get down and let her use your face as a seat."

You comply and get down, laying your face on the chair facing upwards.

Jessica blushes, looking a bit uncomfortable.

"It's funny watching you do these things to your brother," she begins. "But I don't know if I can do it too."

Maybe there's still hope that she has at least some kind of affection for you - or at the very least, some respect.

"Nah, he doesn't care." says Lewis. "He's probably never been that close to a girl's ass before anyways. Have you Ash?" he inquired.

Your face turns red because it's true. But you don't want Jessica to know that. You don't want to disagree with him, though, so you fess up.

"No, I haven't." you respond.

"See?" he says. "Have a seat, he'll probably like it anyways."

Jessica looks down at you, still looking uncomfortable and unsure, but she gives in and slowly lowers her butt onto your face.

Truth be told, Lewis wasn't that far off when he said that. Having her ass on your face wouldn't be so bad - the context of the situation, however, could be a little different. A small part of you finds the idea to be strangely erotic, but you're too emotionally bruised and let down to thoroughly enjoy it that way.

The second her butt settles snugly on your face, you find yourself pleased as it isn't too uncomfortable and you know you'll probably be here for a while.

You'd take this over Lewis's farts any day. You still were in a very embarrassing, bad situation, though, and your thoughts of arousal are overcome by worry and sadness as you realize that you will never be with her - not after she's seen your little, 12 year old brother dominate you so thoroughly.

They laugh loudly. You were so lost in your thoughts that you hadn't been paying attention to their conversation in a while. You start listening to their chatter.

"How bad?" Lewis says.

"Like, really bad!" Jessica replies with an embarrassed giggle.

"Just do it." Lewis says.

"Just do it... Like now?" Jessica says, unsure.

"Yeah!" Lewis says.

You wonder what they are talking about when suddenly, you feel a little bit of pressure leave your face as Jessica raises herself up. Her ass is still planted semi-firmly against your face, but she no longer has her full weight on you. Suddenly, you feel a mild vibration as Jessica's muscles relax, and your whole face is covered in a warm, nasty-smelling fart. Lewis almost chokes on his food from laughing so hard. She joins him.

Unbelievable. She clearly had empathy for you before she sat down, but it's apparent that over the course of their meal, Lewis rubbed off on her and made her more comfortable with the idea of treating you the way he does.

"Wait, wait, wait!" she says quickly.

Trapped in the stinky prison, a few seconds pass before your face is assaulted by yet another immense, warm fart.This one was a bit quieter, but it continues for a couple of seconds, the rancid gas flowing all over your face and permeating throughout her panties and yoga pants. Your nose is positioned just below where (you assume) her butthole would be, so the smell is immediate. You have no choice but to sniff it up as you are running out of air.

Lewis howls with laughter, and all signs of discomfort in Jessica are gone as she laughs along with him. The fart tapers off slowly and comes to a stop, and she sits back down fully again. She slightly shuffles her ass left and right to get comfortable, effectively burying your nose deeper into her ass and trapping the scent all over your face. You don't want to ignore him, and your face is trapped, so you respond, dejected, by raising your hand weakly and slowly giving him the thumbs up. You feel like you're going to be sick. Not only from the smell, but from the emotional distress you are now feeling.

"Good! We'll be done soon, don't worry." he says.

Standing on porch with a troubled expression was Angela. Lewis opened the door for the short, blonde-haired girl, who immediately threw herself at his arms. "What are you doing here?!" the boy exclaimed, surprised and feeling ever so slightly aroused.

"I heard a struggle and then the call dropped!" Angela answered, resting her head on her boyfriend's chest. "I got worried, I thought you might had gotten hurt, so I came here to see you."

"You didn't need to worry. I'm fine, it was just my jerk brother trying to sneak up on me." Lewis comforted her, slowly caressing her glowing blonde hair.

"Where is he?!" Angela asked, pulling away from the hug, brandishing her fists in the air, ready to kick your ass. "And why are you barefoot?"

Your brother laughed heartily, putting an arm around her shoulder and leading her into the kitchen. Inside, they found you focused on the task of preparing dinner, carefully stirring the contents of a sizzling pan. Lewis cleared his throat ever-so dramatically before addressing you:
"Footboy!".

"Yes, master?" Your attention immediately shifted to your brother, standing on the other side of the counter, a smug grin on his face as he talked to Angela, who in turn was left gaping at your response.

"I told you I know how to handle him now. Footboy, come here and kiss her feet!"

"Your wish is my command, master..." you droned, kneeling in front of your Lewis's girlfriend and planting big, long kisses on her black flats which allowed a tiny bit of foot stink-saturated air to waft into your nostrils. Angela, who was eagerly watching your performance, couldn't help but giggled.

"How did you make him obey you?" she asked, dangling her stinky shoe less than inch away from your nose. You greedily snorted all the hot foot smell radiating from her soles, causing her to outright laugh.

"I will tell over dinner. Now, why don't we celebrate our new slave?" Lewis replied, holding Angela's body close to his and dragging her toward the couch. As they started to make out, you were left there staring blankly until your brother managed to command you between kisses:
"Back... to... work... footboy!"
---
Half an hour later, dinner was prepared and served: a large, steaming bowl of spaghetti bolognese. Lewis did as promised and told of your descent into foot slavery: how your parents had left you alone for the next three weeks; the way he had ambushed and restrained you; that you had to withstand a day of fart and ass worship, followed by a whole night with his stinky shoe taped to your face; and that he had blackmailed you into being a foot slave for him and his friends.

He and Angela got a bunch of laughs out of those things alone, but when John came over to murder your brain cells, that's when the real fun began. She had heard rumours about John using his feet to hypnotize the principal into letting him walk free from shattering a classroom window, but to see his footwork for herself was incredible. Lewis described his foot dance with strange, even obsessive detail, leaving his girlfriend to conclude he might have seen it too close for safety. He finished his tale by sharing your triggers, taking care not to set them off by accident.

You were beneath the table through all of Lewis's story, which was, truth be told, your story. Your brother had ordered you to stand on all-fours, to serve as his footstool as his girlfriend teased you with her petite, smooth but not less cheesy feet. And through all of the story, all you could do was allow Lewis's feet to rest on your back and obediently sniff Angela's soles.

An absurdly tall, red-haired girl stood on the other side of the door, shuffling her feet. She had probably heard Lewis walk up to the door, as she lowered her head, trying to look back through the peephole. "Ash?! Lewis?! Are you there?" the girl asked in squeaky voice.

At first, Lewis had failed to recognize her, but as soon as he heard that obnoxious, high-pitched tone, he immediately knew who it was - Emma, his old babysitter. She used to be a regular presence on Friday nights, while your parents were out having fun but still hesitated on letting you take the reins.

Lewis himself had always enjoyed Emma's company, not because she was particularly caring or affectionate, but rather since you wouldn't have much chance of bullying him on her watch. But now that you were putty in his hand, your old babysitter as more of an inconvenience than a blessing. Still, he opened the door and let her into the hall.

"Hi, Emma!" Lewis greeted, hoping to get rid of Emma as soon as possible.

"Hello, Lewis. How are you? I was passing outside and I heard some weird noises. Is everything okay?" she questioned, despite not looking very concerned about the situation.

"Oh? Me and Ash were just having a little fight, that's all!" Lewis answered, a yellow smile on his face.

"Is that so? By the way, where's your brother?" Emma replied, blushing slightly upon Lewis's reaction. She was only 3 years older than his brother and he had always suspected her to harbour a certain crush on you...

"He's in the kitchen. Why don't you sit down in the living room?, I will let him know you're here."

Leaving the somewhat anxious Emma behind, Lewis stepped inside the kitchen as you were hard at work, cooking dinner. Leaning into your ear, he softly whispered the magic words and took a step back before they could take effect: "my toes let you go".

Ash the 17th year old boy suddenly found himself before the stove, unable to remember how he even got there. The sensation of surprise and utter confusion you were feeling could only be likened to having a bucket of ice-cold water spilled over your head. You were barely able to find your bearings when your brother yelled at you from the living room: "What are you waiting for?! Emma is expecting you!".

Unlike Lewis, you loathed your babysitter's presence. It meant not only that you would be unable to give him some well-deserved stink torture, but it also meant you'd probably be subjected to some of the same torture as well! You see, Emma had some serious odour issues: starting with her silent but deadly flatulence which made staying with her for any long period of time a potential death hazard, and ending with her funky size 14 feet which she loved to air out on the couch, she was a ticking stench bomb. Worst of all, she actually fancied you!

Well, now that Emma knew you were home, you had no choice but to face her. You braced yourself and entered the living room.

John had always dreamt about turning you or your brother into his brainwashed foot slave. And now that he had both of you entranced and ready to serve him, it was everything he could have wished for - watching you stare deep into his hypnotizing soles, seeing you lose yourselves in the beauty and stench of his toes, admiring as you slowly succumbed to their spell, falling into a complete and utter trance...

And that's when he realized: he had the power to control you all along! John had used his mind-melting foot scent to get out of trouble at school and with his parents, to control his own big sister and make her do his homework, to seduce cute girls and bully nerds out of their lunch... but he had never understood that his hypnotic soles could take someone so deep, so quickly. And if he could turn both your brains to mush in under twenty minutes, less than a hour would be enough to brainwash his classmates... less than a day to control the entire school... less than a lifetime to have the whole world at his feet!

There was so much to do... so many people to bring beneath his soles... but John knew exactly where to start. He dragged his body closer to you, held his feet up in the air, and gently pushed his meaty soles into your dumb, smiling faces. The smell became a hundred times stronger... vinegary and pungent, it made your empty eyes water and your lungs ache... and yet, neither of you could resist sniffing, harder and harder with each breath. You were addicted to John's stinky, sweaty feet. And there was nothing you could about it, except sniff his soles and listen to his words:
"Hear me and obey, foot slaves! Your Master speaks."

John made a short pause, before grinding his feet harder onto your faces, and resuming his speech in a calm, seductive voice.
"You live to serve me... you live to worship my feet... you live to obey my commands..."

Carried in a whiff of his mind-numbing foot scent, your Master's words settled naturally into your mind. Yes... you lived to serve John... you lived to worship his feet... his big, cheesy feet... you lived to obey your Master's commands... whatever they may be... you wouldn't hesitate... you would only obey.

"You love my feet... and you love to my slaves... my mindless, obedient foot slaves..."

Your Master's stinky toes were like fingers upon the wet clay of your hypnotized brain, shaping it to his every command. You loved John's feet... you loved them so much... and you loved to be his slave... his mindless, obedient foot slave.

"You want to be hypnotized my feet... you want to be aroused by my feet... and you want everyone to be exactly like you..."

Yes! You wanted to be hypnotized, mesmerized, captivated and brainwashed by your Master's feet! His feet... they were so arousing... it was so obvious! How could anybody not understand? Everyone should be exactly like you: John's mindless, obedient foot slave.

"I'm going to count to 3... and with every whiff of my feet, you will become sleepier and sleepier... when I say 3, you will be fast asleep, and when you wake up, you will be under my complete control. 1..."

You took a deep breath, and it was if you'd been hit by dart - you felt a sharp sting on your lungs, before the hypnotic scent began to dissolve in your bloodstream... a warm, fuzzy feeling, crawling from your chest all the way down to your legs, back through your heart and into your head... making you very, very sleepy.

You did nothing.

You resented that your little brother believed he could get you to lick shit off his shoes even at regular height but his mocking remarks were the least of your worries. It was impossible to breathe right now with your face pressed against shit. Your tiny little nose and sinuses weren’t built to withstand, inhale, or even be around dog shit let alone the dog shit Lewis collected at the bottom of his well-worn, filth covered shoe.

If you wanted to see what he would do to you if you stayed small, or if you were so against shrinking him and thinking about how horrifying it could be that you forgot shrinking him would also save yourself. All you knew for sure is that right now you had a choice. Once Lewis had his fill of this humiliating moment you could either give in to your younger brother and do whatever he wanted, you could try and run, or you could stand up for yourself and fight.

When he finished, did he hold in his hands an Ash that was completely broken now and willing to serve him, without question? A frightened Ash? Or a rebellious Ash?

He turned you to face away from him and slinged his index finger back and forth throwing you up in the air then back down in quick jerking motions. He successfully, albeit carelessly, flung you off his finger. You rotated mid fall, and fell down back first onto the hardwood floor with a smacking sound. You yelped loudly with pain as it jolted through your body upon impact the way an extremely active lightning storm might jolt through the night sky.

Before you even had a chance to react Lewis’ beaming & boyish face was looming over you as he bent over and brought the booger still stuck on his finger in your face and rubbed it in.

He laughed when he noticed you weren’t even putting up a fight and just lay still on the floor while the warm bile ball smeared across your face and broke into sections that Lewis continued to rub into you in a counter-clockwise motion.

His big toe was sticking out through a huge hole and although you could see the sock used to be white, it was more grey and dirtied now. You watched him push his finger into his sock and pull it off, his toes wiggling in the air as if saying “we’re free!” He slammed his foot into the ground next to you, causing what seemed like a quick mini earthquake that made you cower before him like a God.

“It probably always was.” You blurted out in a way that made even you cringe.

Lewis started laughing immediately.

“I win?” Lewis asked. “That’s not really news, is it? Of course I won, I just made you lick dog shit off my shoes, then rubbed my booger in your face you spineless fuckbag. What are you gonna do about it?”

“N-Nothing.”

“Right. N-Nothing." Lewis said mocking your fearful stutter. "There’s nothing you can do. I’m bigger, and better than you.”

You didn’t enjoy complimenting your brother, not at all. But you weren’t interested in seeing him angry or upset ever again either. You choked on your own words every time you said something nice to him, because you knew he didn’t deserve it and also you knew everything you said were complete lies but you’d do anything to stay on his good side.

“You’ve always been better than me Lewis.” You lied to him.

“Yes. You will. From now on.” Lewis said.

“From now on.” You repeated.

“Bet.” Lewis said. “Doubt it though. We’ll have to test that theory won’t we?”

“We’ll have to test your limits.” Lewis interrupted. “You WILL beg me to stop, but by the time I’m done with you, you will ACTUALLY be willing to do whatever I want. But for now, I have to clean you don’t I?”

Lewis took the sock that was in his hand and pressed it into your face. You grimaced and tried to lurch back but your back was still against the floor.

info.description:
In this story you take on the role of Ash, a 17 year old boy who likes nothing more than to torture his younger brother Lewis (age 12), by making him smell your stinky farts and malodourous feet and armpits. One day your parents tell you they are going away on a 3 week holiday and that you are to look after your brother while they are away. In the few days leading up to the occassion you can't help but imagine all of the torture your going to bestow upon Lewis, but is way ahead of you.

Rules are as follows;
1. Lewis can restrain you in abosolutley anyway you can think of aslong as he tortures you by making you smell stuff.
2. No Death
3. No Sex (this is for 13+)
4. No Nudity (bare ass/feet is ok but seriously; 13+)
5. Please don't end the story abruptly, I dont want 3 weeks to go by in a chapter.

The rules are pretty flexible but I will delete your entry if they are seriously broken.
